title: Major Cocaine Seizures Nuevo Leon
name: Major Cocaine Seizures Nuevo Leon
description: This data shows the major cocaine seizures (of 25kgs or more) in Nuevo Leon, Mexico from 09/15/2011 to 12/14/2011.

properties.security operations specs: The specific tactics used in the operation were not reported.
properties.bid: 10/21/2011: On Friday, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, military personnel from the 7/a military zone discovered a person aboard a transportation vehicle. Noticing military presence person attempted to flee, but was arrested. Military personnel conducted a search of a vehicle and discovered second person. The military seized 5,000 doses (5,000 grams) of powdered cocaine, 24,500 doses (24,500 grams) of crack cocaine, $2,216,470.00 MXN ($169,533.12 USD), $1,620.00 USD, two money counting machines and two vehicles. One of the detainees, "El Negro," was responsible for collecting money from the sale of drugs, for Los Zetas, in the Monterrey area of Mexico.
properties.opinfo: The military from the 7/a military zone conducted the military operation.
